token.ferramenta: Tool to create annotation of Repeats and Spacers of CRISPR arrangements in Fasta format. This tool was developed with the purpose of providing greater agility in performing repetitive tasks, and have multiple researchers save time during their research.
token.Selecione um arquivo do tipo .xls ou .xl: Upload a file of type .xls or .xlsx
token.suporte: Support this project, so more tools can be developed and research helped.
token.Estudante de Engenharia da Computação e: Computer Engineering student and developer at
